title: Barcelona player ratings vs Girona: Lamine Yamal misses penalty and Pau Cubarsi goes from hero to zero as controversial late winner dents Catalans' title hopes
desc: Girona sprung a huge shock in the title race as they beat Barcelona 2-1 at Montilivi. Lamine Yamal missed a penalty and Hansi Flick's side were left fuming by a controversial late goal, as the Catalan side dropped important points in the title race amidst a fierce battle with Real Madrid at the summit.

title: Irish contribution to US presidency celebrated
desc: The contribution of Ireland to the United States in this, the 250th anniversary year of the US Declaration of Independence, was marked by wreath laying ceremonies in Washington, DC, at the grave of John F Kennedy.

title: Frederick Wiseman, 96, Penetrating Documentarian of Institutions, Dies
desc: He exposed abuses in films like “Titicut Follies,” a once-banned portrait of a mental hospital, but ranged widely in subject matter, from a Queens neighborhood to a French restaurant.

title: Ray J performs with bleeding eyes weeks after saying he has months to live
desc: Singer Ray J performed a concert on Saturday with what appeared to be bleeding eyes and something taped to his chest, weeks after claiming he only has months to live: 'I'm putting my life on the line for this show!'

title: How dark web agent spotted bedroom wall clue to rescue girl from abuse
desc: Detectives desperate to locate a 12-year-old, seen abused online, found a surprising lead.

title: What Larry Madowo said about the filmed encounters involving Russian national
desc: A Kenyan journalist and CNN International correspondent, Larry Madowo, has revealed that a Russian national identified as Yaytselav, accused of filming his sexual escapades with several Ghanaian women, had been operating across Africa for some time.
